vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπίμεικτος, ον,
common to, Λυδοῖς καὶ Καρσί 1st c.BC-1st c.AD: Strabo Geographus 14.1.38.
__2. mixed, [Refs]; φάσηλοι ἐ. ἐκ φορτίδων νεῶν καὶ μακρῶν combining the features of.., [LXX]
__3. in Metric, of metres in which different feet are combined, [Refs]
__4. sociable, gregarious, Timo [Refs]
__5. adverb -τως in combination, [Refs]
